title: Bata Boy and Crocs Girl
overview: Set in the New York of South India, Bengaluru - this film is an ode to the hope and dream of fleeting romances in new cities.  Gokul and Ishita - two very different people who in their words, "like each other, hang out with each other and have sex. But aren't in a relationship." Do they have any idea what they're doing? Absolutely not.
